page.title: 11FARMING
page.content: In this area the majority of land is farmland.The area which we studied contained six farms.All the farms practiced{arable}farming,growing crops such as{barley;both spring and winter, some small areas of{wheat and oil_seed {rape.}Some of the area also had permenant pastureland used for the grazing of cattle for dairying.Fresian cows are used for dairying and Hereford cattle were also kept for fattening. There are areas of rough pastureland and some small woodland areas.These are situated on steep stoney ground. {Fragmentation}has taken place here,the evidence of this is in the farm names and field sizes e.g. North and South Ythsie , Newseat and East Newseat of Tolquhon.In all these farms the fields are{large and regular
